questions.questionTitle: Who most likely are the speakers?
What does the woman want to know about health benefits?
anwers: If they apply to her family.

questions.questionTitle: What will the woman probably do next?

script:
� So, I think we've covered just about everything. What questions do you have?
� About the health benefits? Do those cover my husband and children too? Also, do they include dental and vision?
� Yes, our health plan covers all employees' spouses and immediate family members. Dental and vision are included in the basic plan, but vision is limited to employees only. Vision for family members costs a little extra.
� OK, thanks. Now, I'd like to know a little more about...
